types1:Item.types1:Name: SP-DXC-ALLTRANSACTIONTYPE
types1:Item.types1:Description: Process to send INCIDENT information with all transaction type from SNOW to DXC.

process.name: SP-DXC-ALLTRANSACTIONTYPE
process.description: Process to send INCIDENT information with all transaction type from SNOW to DXC.

operation.expression: if ($temp.temp_Transactiontype='INSERT') then '4' else if ($temp.temp_Transactiontype='ACK') then '12' else if ($temp.temp_Transactiontype='RESOLVE') then '8' else if ($temp.temp_Transactiontype='UPDATE' )then '10' else if ($temp.temp_Transactiontype='CANCEL') then '0' else if ($temp.temp_Transactiontype='CLOSE') then '1' else if ($temp.temp_Transactiontype='REOPEN') then '10' else ''

if ($temp.temp_priority ='1') then 'enterprise' else if ($temp.temp_priority ='2') then 'site_dept' else if ($temp.temp_priority ='3') then 'multiple_users' else if ($temp.temp_priority ='4' )then 'user' else ''
if ($temp.temp_priority ='1') then 'critical' else if ($temp.temp_priority ='2') then 'high' else if ($temp.temp_priority ='3') then 'average' else if ($temp.temp_priority ='4')then 'low' else ''

if ($temp.temp_State='New') then 'open' else if ($temp.temp_State='Assigned') then 'assigned' else if ($temp.temp_State='In Progress') then 'work_in_progress' else if ($temp.temp_State='On hold' )then 'pending_customer' else if ($temp.temp_State='Resolved' )then 'resolved' else if ($temp.temp_State='Closed' )then 'closed' else if ($temp.temp_State='Cancelled' )then 'Void' else ''
if ($temp.temp_priority ='1') then 'critical' else if ($temp.temp_priority='2') then 'high' else if ($temp.temp_priority='3') then 'average' else if ($temp.temp_priority='4' )then 'low' else ''

if ($temp.temp_resolution_codes ='Informed/Advised' ) then $temp.temp_specialcharresolutioncode else if ($temp.temp_resolution_codes ='No Customer Response') then 'No user response' else if ($temp.temp_resolution_codes ='Future Enhancement') then 'Change' else $temp.temp_resolution_codes

if ($temp.temp_AssignmentGroup ='IT-Hosting-MEU-GCS-UX-L1-DxC') then 'E-INCFLS-GDO-GCS-UX' else if ($temp.temp_AssignmentGroup ='IT-Hosting-MEU-GCS-UX-L2-DxC') then 'E-INCSSP-GDO-GCS-UX' else if input.parameter:
Hello Team,
Fail to Insert { $temp.temp_number } in DXC with following error : {$output.faultInfo[1]/reason }

Hello Team,
Fail to ACK { $temp.temp_number } in DXC with following error : {$output.faultInfo[1]/reason }

Hello Team,

Hello Team,

Hello Team,
